content.description:
Broken crack with edges all around crux 30 feet up.  Good beginner lead.  10 feet right of

"Dorsal Crack"

.
content.protection:
Gear to 1 1/2 inches.  Walk off or over left to

Shark's Fin

Wall.
content.location:
Park 1.2 miles past The Beige Siphon Tube and hike up the drainage on the north side of the road.  Short wall on the right prior to getting to the

Shark's Fin

Wall.  Same parking as for all the road side climbs west of the bridge.

content.description: Climb a 40 ft. left facing crack to the top of the wall and belay from an evergreen tree. This climb is great for beginners to practice setting natural belays, using gear for the first time, and beats climbing that third class crap to the "Shark Fin Wall."
content.location: About 40 yds. before the base of the Shark Fin Wall is a small face with a small evergreen at the top.
